faq.question: What is SnapTogether?
faq.answer: SnapTogether is a photo-sharing tool that allows guests to upload event photos by scanning a QR code, making it easy for hosts to collect memories.

faq.question: How do I upload photos as a guest?
faq.answer: Scan the QR code given to you by the host, enter your name, and upload your favorite photos from the event — no account needed.

faq.question: Do I need to create an account?
faq.answer: No. Guests don’t need an account. Hosts just create a one-time event link.

faq.question: Where are the photos stored?
faq.answer: All images are securely uploaded and stored on the cloud, ensuring they’re safe and accessible for the host.

faq.question: What's the difference between Free, Starter, and Pro plans?
faq.answer: Free: Limited storage, no videos. Starter: More storage & support. Pro: Max storage, videos, branding.

faq.question: How long are my photos available?
faq.answer: Uploaded media is available for 30 days after the event unless you're on a paid plan.

aboutPage.title: About SnapTogether
aboutPage.subtitle: SnapTogether is a simple way to collect photos and videos from your guests, making every event more memorable — all without an app.

sections.title: Capture Moments Easily
sections.description: SnapTogether is a simple way to collect all the special moments from your event — captured by your guests.

sections.title: Create Your Event Instantly
sections.description: Whether it’s a wedding, birthday, business opening, or any kind of celebration — you can create an event on our website and instantly get a unique QR code.

sections.title: Effortless Guest Sharing
sections.description: Share that QR code with your guests. When they scan it, they can easily upload the photos they take during your event — no apps, no sign-up, just quick and easy sharing.

sections.title: A Gallery of Memories
sections.description: As the host, you’ll receive all the photos in one place, giving you a beautiful collection of memories from every angle — straight from your guests’ phones.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.content:
SnapTogether is committed to protecting your privacy.

We collect and store only the personal information required to provide our services, including names, event identifiers, and uploaded media (photos or videos). We do not sell or share your personal data with any third parties.

Uploaded content is stored securely and automatically deleted according to your plan’s retention period. You retain ownership of your content and may contact us to request data deletion.

We use secure protocols and encryption where appropriate, and your data is hosted in secure cloud infrastructure.

If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please reach out at: support@snaptogether.cloud.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.content:
By using SnapTogether, you agree to use the service responsibly and in accordance with the law. You must not upload or share content that:

- Infringes copyrights, privacy, or any other applicable laws
- Is offensive, harmful, or illegal
- Violates the rights of others

SnapTogether reserves the right to remove any content deemed inappropriate, and to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

You are responsible for ensuring that all uploaded content complies with applicable data protection laws and that you have the necessary rights or permissions to share it.
termsPage.usageContent:
You must not misuse SnapTogether’s services. Misuse includes but is not limited to:

- Uploading offensive, unlawful, or harmful material
- Tampering with, disrupting, or reverse-engineering the service’s functionality
- Abusing the platform’s purpose or engaging in fraudulent activities

Violations may result in the immediate suspension or termination of your access without a refund.
termsPage.paddleNoticeContent: Our order process is conducted by our online reseller Paddle.com. Paddle.com is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle provides all customer service inquiries and handles returns.

refundPage.title: Refund Policy
refundPage.content:
SnapTogether offers a full refund if requested within 7 days of your original payment, provided that:

- Your event has not yet started, and
- No uploads have been made by your guests.

Once uploads have begun or the event date has passed, refunds are no longer available.

If you experience any technical issues, please contact us as soon as possible at support@snaptogether.cloud.

We aim to process refunds within 5–7 business days from the date of approval.
